product_name: Outdoor Research Ultralight Ditty Sacks - Package of 3
long_description: This set of 3 Outdoor Research Ultralight Ditty sacks keeps small items such as sunscreen, socks, headlamps, and compasses from floating around your pack. Lightweight siliconized ripstop nylon fabric resists moisture and easily slides into your pack. Set includes a 3-liter (183 cu. in.) sack, a 4-liter (244 cu. in.) sack and a 6-liter (366 cu. in.) sack. Drawcords with cordlocks keep the Outdoor Research Ultralight Ditty sacks securely closed. Each sack weighs less than 1 oz.
short_description: This set of 3 Outdoor Research Ultralight Ditty sacks keeps small items such as sunscreen, socks, headlamps, and compasses from floating around your pack.
